metadata.title: CVE-2017-16667 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: backintime (aka Back in Time) before 1.1.24 did improper escaping/quotingof file paths used as arguments to the 'notify-send' command, leading tosome parts of file paths being executed as shell commands within anos.system call in qt4/plugins/notifyplugin.py. This could allow an attackerto craft an unreadable file with a specific name to run arbitrary shellcommands.

criterions.comment: backintime: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
